title: Ticket #1700: Gridmanager should retry failed purge command for Cream jobs
description:
When the gridmanager needs to cancel a Cream job, it issues a cancel command, followed by a purge command. If these commands are too closely spaced, the purge can fail because the Cream server hasn't finished processing the cancel. The server will return the error "job status does not match".

The gridmanager can do two things to cope with this: * Introduce a small delay between the two commands. * Retry a purge command that fails with the error given above, after a small delay.
remarks:
2010-Oct-08 10:22:51 by jfrey:
We already have a delay of 5 seconds between CANCEL and PURGE commands. Maybe it should be increased.

2010-Oct-08 12:54:32 by jfrey:
Pushed a commit to V7_4-branch for 7.4.4. A failed purge command will be retried up to two additional times.
